sessions.name: Getting Started with Ionic
sessions.description: Mobile devices and browsers are now advanced enough that developers can build native-quality mobile apps using open web technologies like HTML5, Javascript, and CSS. In this talk, we’ll provide background on why and how we created Ionic, the design decisions made as we integrated Ionic with Angular, and the performance considerations for mobile platforms that our team had to overcome. We’ll also review new and upcoming Ionic features, and talk about the hidden powers and benefits of combining mobile app development and Angular.

lyrics.title: All Along
lyrics.content:
Time just drifts away
And as I look back on the years
Memories of happiness
And bitter tears

Through it all
there was a common thread
That cannot be ignored
You were there teaching me to be
Your servant, Lord

Chorus:
All along,
Your hand has been guiding me
Shaping my life to be
a beautiful song
All along,
You've led me through
The things that You do
Would make me strong
Your love has been there
all along.

Every joy and pain
Had a reason of its own
Now I've realized
That I was not alone

The changing seasons of my life 
Would not left us the chance
But I know You were working
To fulfill Your plans

Chorus:
All along,
Your hand has been guiding me
Shaping my life to be
a beautiful song
All along,
You've led me through
The things that You do
Would make me strong
Your love has been there
all along.

Bridge:
Tomorrow when I turn around
And I look back at today
I will understand Your purpose
And my thankful heart will sing

Chorus:
All along,
Your hand has been guiding me
Shaping my life to be
a beautiful song
All along,
You've led me through
The things that You do
Would make me strong
Your love has been there
all along.

lyrics.title: Amazing Love
lyrics.content:
The morning star grows faint,
in streaks of bran new day
The clouds are rimmed with rose,
the night is chased away
The star we call our own,
treks it's westward way
And all is earth is filled,
all the earth is filled with Song--

Chorus
Amazing love! 
Amazing love!
Amazing love, 
how can it be
that light should rise
and shine on me…
Amazing love

The rain that blurs the glass,
the tears that stain the face
Both serve to wash away
every selfish trace
And when sun shines again,
we see the work of grace
Each drop is now a stone,
each glistening drop,
a diamond rare

Chorus:
Amazing love! 
Amazing love!
Amazing love,
how can it be
that joy should come,
and tears should flee.
Amazing love

lyrics.title: At The Crystal Sea
lyrics.content:
Verse I:
Though I'm unworthy
of your great love
You left the glory
of your royal throne above,
And though your gifts of grace
I often have despised.
This is your legacy
which I have come to prize.

Chorus:
You choose to keep on loving me.
The best of yours you give to me.
You've promised that your strength
is always mine.

Though after all the world you see,
You never take your eyes off me.
I can almost see you standing there
beside the crystal sea.
And pondering from eternity
how you can make my life so sweet.

Verse II:
My heart is ready.
It's open wide,
for you to do your work
and reign as king inside.
I wish that I could give,
what you have given me
and in my tiny way
I can by loving thee.

Chorus:
You choose to keep on loving me.
The best of yours you give to me.
You've promised that your strength
is always mine.
Though after all the world you see,
You never take your eyes off me.
I can almost see you standing there
beside the crystal sea.
And pondering form eternity
how you can make my life so sweet.

Verse III;
I stand and wonder,
of what you've done.
The blessings that you've given
reaching everyone.
And just when I have thought
there isn't room for more.
You've shown that there's no end,
to what you have in store.

Chorus:
You choose to keep on loving me.
The best of yours you give to me.
You've promised that your strength
is always mine.
Though after all the world you see.
You never take your eyes off me.
I can almost see you standing there
beside the crystal sea.
And pondering from eternity
how you can make my life so sweet.

lyrics.title: Christ In Me, The Hope of Glory
lyrics.content:
Jesus Christ lives within
No more stains, I’m free from sin
In purity and meekness
I shall be His witness

The Bridegroom is my maker
Jesus my redeemer
The God of all the earth,
In Christ, I have my worth

(Chorus)
Christ in me, the hope of glory!
The hope of all ages
From His abundant mercies,
He paid for our sin’s wages
Christ in me, the Hope of glory!
My soul yields to Him daily
For I shall claim my victory
Through Christ in me
The Hope of Glory

My old soul stinks from sin
So dark the past that I have been
Yet heartened by His words
His grace reveals my worth

I’m cleansed through His forgiveness
Jesus is my righteousness
I know that He is working
There’s Christ in me renewing

(Chorus)
Christ in me, the hope of glory!
The hope of all ages
From His abundant mercies,
He paid for our sin’s wages
Christ in me, the Hope of glory!
My soul yields to Him daily
For I shall claim my victory
Through Christ in me
The Hope of Glory

Earth and heav’n be made brand new
Pearly gate I’ll enter through
God wipes away all tears
No more pain, no more fears

The alpha and Omega
Is preparing His rewards
The truth lives in my heart
His prophecies I mark

(Chorus)
Christ in me, the hope of glory!
The hope of all ages
From His abundant mercies,
He paid for our sin’s wages
Christ in me, the Hope of glory!
My soul yields to Him daily
For I shall claim my victory
Through Christ in me
The Hope of Glory

We have this hope that
burns within our hearts!
Hope in the coming of the Lord
Yes I shall claim my victory
Through Christ in me
The Hope of glory

lyrics.title: Destined For Greatness
lyrics.content:
A fresh wind is blowing
It's the wind of God's Spirit
Be still and know His voice
Listen and you'll hear it

A new call is stirring
Increasing in power
Feel the Spirit releasing
His strength by the hour

We will rise to the call
We will stand and obey
We are warriors who's weapon
Is God's highest praise

The Bridegroom is coming
So rise up, oh, Bride
Let His mighty kingdom triumph
Let us give our very lives

Destined for greatness
With the passionate faith
Moving in His power
Clothed in garments of praise
Strong in the Spirit
One holy nation
True to the calling of
Our great salvation
We are destined, destined for greatness

To love the unlovable
Teach the unteachable
Touch the untouchable
Reach the unreachable

See the unseeable
Shake the unshakeable
Heal the unhealable
Break the unbreakable

Love the unlovable
Teach the unteachable
Touch the untouchable
Reach the unreachable

See the unseeable
Shake the unshakeable
Heal the unhealable
Break the unbreakable

We will rise to the call
We will stand and obey
We are warriors who's weapon
Is God's highest praise

The Bridegroom is coming
Rise up, oh, Bride
Let His mighty kingdom triumph
Let us give our very lives

Destined for greatness
With the passionate faith
Moving in His power
Clothed in garments of praise

Strong in the Spirit
One holy nation
True to the calling of
Our great salvation

We are destined, destined for greatness

We are destined (we are destined)
We are destined (we are destined)
We are destined (we are destined)
Destined for greatness!

lyrics.title: He is My All
lyrics.content:
When the night is long,
He is the dawn
Light that never fails
Though other hope is gone
He is the balm for every wound,
For every sorrow great or small
He is my strength,
He is my song,
He is my all

When my world is troubled
He is peace
When my soul is burdened
He is my release
He is my solace when I weep,
He is my rescue when I call
He is my strength,
He is my song,
He is my all

He is my way, my truth,
my life, my joy in living
He is my comfort when I fall,
and sweet forgiving
He is my fortress,
and the rock that cannot fail
He is my strength,
He is my song,
He is my all

So through all my days
He is my King
Source of endless love
and all the praises I sing
And when at last
I kneel before Him,
Safe at home in heaven’s halls
Then as before, and ever more,
He will be my all

He is my Savior,
sure and strong
He is the light that leads me on
He is my strength,
He is my song
He is my all

lyrics.title: I Stand Redeemed
lyrics.content:
When I think of all my faults and my failures
When I consider all the times i let God down
I am humbled at the grace He has extended
I'm amazed at the mercy I have found
I could never earn His love on my own
Yet every time I come before His throne

Chours
I stand redeemed by the blood of the lamb
I stand redeemed before the great I Am
When He looks at me
He sees the nail-scarred Hands
That bought my liberty I stand redeemed

Even at my best I am unworthy
I have nothing precious I can give
A broken heart is all I have to offer
And yet it is a priceless gift to Him
The bitter mark of sin will never fade away
But I can come before Him unashamed

Chours
I stand redeemed by the blood of the lamb
I stand redeemed before the great I Am
When He looks at me
He sees the nail-scarred Hands
That bought my liberty I stand redeemed

lyrics.title: I Will Change Your Name
lyrics.content:
I will change your name
You shall no longer be called
Wounded, outcast
Lonely or afraid

I will change your name
Your new name shall be
Confidence, joyfulness
Overcoming one
Faithfulness, friend of God
One who seeks my face.

lyrics.title: My Redeemer Is Faithful And True
lyrics.content:
As I look back on the road I've traveled,
I see so many times He carried me through;
And if there's one thing
that I've learned in my life,
My Redeemer is faithful and true.
My Redeemer is faithful and true.

[Chorus]
My Redeemer is faithful and true.
Everything He has said He will do,
And every morning His mercies are new.
My Redeemer is faithful and true.

My heart rejoices when I read the promise
'There is a place I am preparing for you.'
I know someday I'll see my Lord face to face,
'Cause my Redeemer is faithful and true.
My Redeemer is faithful and true.

[Chorus]
My Redeemer is faithful and true.
Everything He has said He will do,
And every morning His mercies are new.
My Redeemer is faithful and true.

And in every situation
He has proved His love to me;
When I lack the understanding,
He gives more grace to me.

[Chorus]
My Redeemer is faithful and true.
Everything He has said He will do,
And every morning His mercies are new.
My Redeemer is faithful and true.

lyrics.title: This Witness I Will Bear
lyrics.content:
Verse: 1
Have you heard the story told
of the Man whose heart was sold
To save my dying soul?
Oh, what love untold.

To the end He’s always sought me.
To the end He’s always loved me.
To the end I long to follow
for He bore my cross of sorrow.

I will stay here in the hollow of His care
and I will go anywhere, to the end.
This witness I will bear, to the end.

Verse: 2
In the grove I heard Him say,
“Oh my Father please just stay.”
Through broken hearted pain
He did pave the way.

To the end His heart is faithful.
To the end His hand is able.
To the end I can now follow
for He bore my cross of sorrow.

I will stay here in the hollow of His care
and I will go anywhere, to the end.
This witness I will bear, to the end.

Verse: 3
As they took Him off to die,
there His friendship I denied.
Forgiveness in His eyes,
He did not despise.

To the end His love constrains me.
To the end He has restored me.
To the end I will still follow
for He bore my cross of sorrow.

I will stay here in the hollow of His care
and I will go anywhere, to the end.
This witness I will bear, to the end.

lyrics.title: To Rescue a Sinner Like Me
lyrics.content:
I don't understand
how a God so divine
Could lower Himself
to a life such as mine
And consider me worth
every minute of time
To rescue a sinner like me

When I think of my savior
alone on the cross
I know without him
That my life would be lost
If he had not been willing
to suffer the cost
To rescue a sinner like me

To rescue a sinner like me, Lord
To rescue a sinner like me
He abandoned his throne
and his kingdom above
To rescue a sinner like me

My mind is so limited
that I cannot see
The reason he died
and arose just for me
So unworthy was I,
yet he gave willingly
To rescue a sinner like me

To rescue a sinner
as worthless as I
Yet he gave me a reason to sing
It's so hard to believe
but it happened to me
Hallelujah to Jesus my king
My king

lyrics.title: Tracing God's Footprints
lyrics.content:
Many feel that it would be a great privilege
To visit the scenes of Christ's life on earth,
To walk where He trod,
To look upon the lake beside
Which He loved to teach,
And the hills and valleys
On which His eyes so often rested.

We are the followers of Christ,
We are to labor as He did.
We are to feed the hungry, clothe the naked,
We are to comfort the suffering
And encourage the afflicted.
We are to minister to the despairing,
And inspire hope in the hopeless.

We need not go to Nazareth, or to Bethany,
In order to walk in His steps.
We shall find His footprints beside the sick-bed,
In the hovels of poverty, 
Doing as Jesus did when on earth,
We shall walk in His steps.

We are the followers of Christ,
We are to labor as He did.
We are to feed the hungry, clothe the naked,
We are to comfort the suffering
And encourage the afflicted.
We are to minister to the despairing,
And inspire hope in the hopeless.

We are the followers of Christ,
We are to labor as He did.
We are to feed the hungry, clothe the naked,
We are to comfort the suffering
And encourage the afflicted.
We are to minister to the despairing,
And inspire hope in the hopeless.

We are tracing God's footprints.

lyrics.title: Undivided Heart
lyrics.content:
If I'm to be whom You desire
All throughout my life
A vessel unto honour, Lord to Thee
And before Your throne to hear You say
That I have done my part
Lord, I need an undivided heart.

That I might know You
That I might serve You
That I might worship You as King
To see the morning star,
To know how great You are
Lord, I need an undivided heart.

If I'm to live in truth & love
To glorify Your name
If for a living sacrifice to be
And to share the joy, the grace and peace
Your Spirit does impart
Lord, I need an undivided heart.

That I might know You
That I might serve You
That I might worship You as King
To see the morning star,
To know how great You are
Lord, I need an undivided heart.

To see the morning star,
To know how great You are
Lord, I need an undivided heart.
